data.name: Chaos on Wheels
data.detailed_description:
Join Chaos community

Join Discord and sign up for Beta, win amazing rewards, be in the loop of the development, and vote for the next feature in Chaos on Wheels!


About the Game

Chaos on Wheels: Ultimate & Chaotic multiplayer vehicular combat experience. Customize your cars, equip armor, buy weapons, unlock new gadgets, upgrade ammo and fight other players in a battle of total mayhem. Choose your driver and take a wheel of a heavily armored car. Drive yourself to victory by destroying any enemy that stands in your way. Avoid projectiles, traps, and hazards and bring chaos to anyone who opposes you.
Complete achievements, upgrade cars and make even more chaos.

Key Features:

Fast-paced multiplayer action with tons of bullets, rockets, and missiles. Play with your friends, find new friends and enemies, destroy them all and leave nothing but chaos.


Manage your special garage where you can upgrade weapons, ammo, and armor. Equip new gadgets, add wraps, throw in some colors and make your dream ride. Fill in all 5 slots with your custom deadly machines.


Pick your driver, and seat your belt because you're behind the wheel of a heavily equipped, high-powered machine designed to destroy. Drive, drift, jump and make cool stunts because no one is there to stop you.


Don't forget about Turrets and Hazards. They are there to stop you! Destroy them first and unlock new cars, weapons, armors, or gadgets and leave Helios and his turret army in ashes.

data.short_description: Take a wheel of a heavily armored car of your choice, and drive yourself to victory while shooting and destroying enemy cars, turrets, and hazards in this chaotic multiplayer vehicular combat experience. Choose driver, customize your cars, upgrade armor, buy new weapons, and leave nothing but chaos!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1000 series or AMD RX 5000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably SSD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2000 series or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably SSD
